demolition

Class DemolitionGameMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • demolition.DemolitionGameMap

  • public class DemolitionGameMap
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the game map in the demolition game. This class builds map in the game and allocate solid wall, broken wall and empty tile to thier places.
